attributes.action: BRING AN END TO THE DIRTY PROTEST 2011. Instate POW rights for all political prisoners in Maghaberry Jail.
attributes.additional_details: Stop the mistreatment of political prisoners in NI jails. Make the government live up to its agreements on their treatment and stop the brutalising and harrasment by prison authorities against political detaineees. In doing so this will bring an end to the dirty protest being staged by the prisoner.
